issues.title: Missing Code Definition
issues.description: The code snippet "print hello" is incomplete.  The string 'hello' needs to be enclosed in quotes for it to be interpreted correctly as a string literal.

issues.title: Lack of Clarity
issues.description: The code lacks context.  It's unclear what the purpose of this code is or where it fits within a larger program.

feedback: The code has a major problem due to a syntax error.  It needs to be made syntactically correct and given more context to be evaluated properly.
